colldesc.longmktgtext:
Dear [userName],

We have received your request to have your password reset.


Your validation code is:    [validationCode]

Use the validation code in the browser where you initiated the password reset request.


Thanks,

The [storeName] team

Dear customer,

[senderName] from e-mail address : [senderEmail] has created a wish list.

To take a look, click the following link:

[link]

Thanks,

The [storeName] team

Help
Frequently Asked Questions
How do I order?

It's easy to order from [storeName]. If this is your first time purchasing from our store, just follow these three easy steps:

  1. Browse the catalog.
  2. Add the item you want to your shopping cart.
  3. Complete the checkout flow.

You will be asked for your e-mail address and a password to register yourself as a customer. Then, the next time you shop with us, we will have your information already stored, and you won't need to input it again.

How can I pay?

We accept Visa, MasterCard, or American Express. When you are checking out, you will be prompted to enter your credit card number for payment.

Is it safe to use my credit card?

We guarantee that every transaction you make at [storeName] will be 100 percent safe and secure. This means you pay nothing if unauthorized charges are made to your card as a result of shopping at [storeName]. If you feel more comfortable, you may enter only your cards last five digits and its expiration date. Once you have fully submitted your order, you can call us and let us know the rest of your card number over the phone.

How do I track my order?

You can review the status of any order you have placed at [storeName] simply by clicking the My account link at the top of every page. From there, you will be able to view or modify any order that has yet to enter the shipping process.

Contact Us
Contact Information

We're here to help.


For support with your order, write to us at support@[storeName].com.


If you have any questions about [storeName], or would like to provide feedback about our store or website, please contact us at questions@[storeName].com.

Return Policy
Our Policy

If for any reason you are not completely satisfied with your order, simply contact customer service for instructions on how to return your order for a full refund. If and when you are ready to place another order, we will be happy to serve you again.

Privacy Policy
Personal Information

[storeName] is committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. You can visit [storeName] on the Web without telling us who you are or revealing any information about yourself. When necessary, for shipping and billing purposes, your personal information is stored in a secure server and will never be sold to a third party or used for contacting you without your consent.


If you choose to give us personal information through the Internet that we may need to correspond with you or to process an order, it is our intent to let you know how we will use this information. If you tell us that you do not wish to have this information used as a basis for further contact with you, we will respect your wishes.


Information collected by [storeName] is used internally by authorized [storeName] employees for three main purposes. First, we collect information to determine how to improve our site by seeing which areas, features and products are most popular. Second, we collect information in order to personalize the site for our customers. For example, in the future, we may recommend products or features you may like based on what you have liked in the past. Lastly, we keep track of the domains from which people visit us. We analyze this data for trends and statistics, and then discard it.


That is our commitment to you.

About Us
Our Story

Established in 1957, [storeName] began as a small goods and services shop in New York City. Today, there are over 800 [storeName] department stores worldwide in 15 countries. [storeName] employs over 125,000 people.


What began with a commitment to high quality products at fair prices continues through to this day on [storeName].com, featuring the same brands and styles you've come to rely on in our brick and mortar stores, available at your fingertips 24 hours a day.


Take a look around, we hope you like what you see!

Our Mission

Our mission is to provide our customers with the best and most convenient online shopping experience possible. We are committed to offering products that are shipped in easy to open and sustainable packaging and accept all major credit cards.

Corporate Responsibility

[storeName] supports healthy living in every aspect of our business. From our "safer communities" initiative to our environmental sustainability project, we take pride in our responsibility to our shoppers, their diversity, their communities and their health and safety.

Contact [storeName] Corporate
[storeName] Head Office

We are personally committed to providing you with superb customer service. If you would like to contact us with a question or comment, please choose the most appropriate corporate division below for a prompt response:

Human Resources

Our Human Resource office is available Monday to Friday, 8am-5pm EST. You may contact us by email anytime at careers@[storeName].com

Consumer Relations

Our Consumer Relations office is available Wednesday to Friday, 8am-5pm EST. You may contact us by email anytime at relations@[storeName].com

Corporate Responsibility

For more information on [storeName] Corporate Responsibility, please visit the About Us page or send us a message at info@[storeName].com

[storeName] Corporate head office is located at:

Street123

Toronto Ontario

Canada M3C-1L1

colldesc.marketingtext:
Our mission is to provide our customers with the best and most convenient online shopping experience possible. We are committed to offering products that are shipped in easy to open and sustainable packaging.

 

Please see our Privacy Policy for more information

 

www.[STORE_NAME].com | Copyright [STORE_NAME], NY. 2012.

colldesc.longmktgtext:
Dear [userName],


We have received your request to have your password emailed to you.

Your password is: [password]

Please remember that your password is case sensitive.


Thanks,
The [storeName] team

Dear User,

Your account has been activated now.

Click below to login and continue shopping.

[link]

Thanks,

The [storeName] team

colldesc.marketingtext: Thank you for ordering from [storeName]. Your order, number [orderNumber], cannot be completed because of a problem authorizing your payment. To purchase the following items, call us at 1-800-555-1234. Thanks again for shopping at [storeName].

colldesc.longmktgtext: Thank you for ordering from [storeName]. We received payment authorization for your order, number [orderNumber]. Use the following shipping tracking number to track this package: [trackingNumber]. If you are shipping items to other shipping addresses or using alternate shipping methods, you will receive a separate e-mail with those shipping details. If you have any questions or concerns about your order, you can contact us by e-mail at orders@[storeName].com or by phone at 1-800-555-1234. Thanks again for shopping at [storeName].

Dear [userName],

We have received your request to have your password reset.


Your validation code is:    [validationCode]


Copy the validation code and enter it on the following page to reset your password:    [resetPasswordFormURL]


Thanks,

The [storeName] team
